item.title: How to manage resources in the external tenant in Azure?
item.description: The case You want to manage resources in other tenants without additional workload around that like accounts creation for you and your teammates in the destination Azure tenant or disabling those accounts if someone leaves the team. Is there any solution for that? The answer is: yes! And it is called Azure Lighthouse. From docs: Azure Lighthouse enables cross- and multi-tenant management, allowing for higher automation, scalability, and enhanced governance across resources and tenants.
